availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Venable Goode, Sr. (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Son of John C. Goode and Dorothy "Dolly" Venable Goode. Married to Elizabeth Taylor Goode in Warren County, Kentucky, on October 11, 1829. Father of Sarah Ann Goode Taylor, William A. Goode, Louisa A. Goode Miller, Henry A. Goode, Martha Goode, and Samuel V. Goode. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Warren County in 1861. Died in Warren County on March 8, 1862.
